title: ThatGuyThatArt
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme hidetitle=a]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra-bhl]]
[[module CSS]]
:root {
 --header-title: "THATFOUNDATION";
 --header-subtitle: "IN SILLINESS WE TRUST";
 --lgurl: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Aanomaly-class-bar/cernunnos-icon.svg");
 --accentColor: 227, 0, 217;
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
+ WELCOME TO THAT ART PAGE OF ALL TIME
+++ Home to the works and wonders of one [[*user ThatGuyThatTime]].
//“Ego usus est instrumentum translation.” 
- That one philosopher from That relatively ancient time period.//
@@ @@
[[div class="blockquote"]]
+++++ LATEST WORK
//(As of: June 11th, 2023)//
[[collapsible show="MAMJUL & KORAR" hide="microwave."]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/TcyXos2.jpeg]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
Hi! I’m that guy mentioned above, and I guess I’m one of those “artists”. I primarily create posters or other designs in Adobe Illustrator (love vector art), but I do other stuff too from time to time. There’s a sizeable amount of work here, but there’s definitely more to come in the future (I say with a boulder of salt).
@@ @@
++++ That’s far too many words just show the art.
@@ @@
What? Who are you? Is that a g-
@@ @@
++++ bang bang gun noise
@@ @@
+++ INDIVIDUAL ARTICLES, ALL THROWN TOGETHER.

@@ @@
[[tabview]]
[[tab 001 PROPOSALS]]

This is my series of artworks for the many 001 proposals on the wiki! They’re all based around the same template (except the exceptions to that rule) — a template that becomes clearer the more you look at them. I figured it would be a fun exercise in limitation. It was.

Okay fine. I [[[ThatAuthorpageThatTime|Write sometimes]]], and have a [https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/thatguythattime-in-the-sandzone Sandbox].

Goodbye now!
